Module JavaProject
Package restaurant.controller

Class ReservationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • restaurant.controller.AbstractController<Reservation>
      • restaurant.controller.ReservationController
  • public class ReservationController
extends AbstractController<Reservation>

    Business logic pertaining to Reservation. It involves the create, read, update and delete functionalities.

    Inherits AbstractController

    Author:
    Shirlley
